title: Life in the fast lane: Hyundai has dodged a slump in India. Can it shift to overdrive in 2020?
text:
Like most automakers, Hyundai, too, has its set of problems. But it was quick to realise that in an age of short product life cycles, success hinges on reading the pulse of the market early on. The company may have missed spotting trend changes at times, but it was quick to course-correct. And the returns have been handsome.
